query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_users, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN email = 'luisrubiof@gmail.com' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as luis_count,
       SUM(CASE WHEN role = 'admin' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as admin_count
FROM users;

       SUM(CASE WHEN role = 'admin' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as admin_count
